argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idresperm.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_f1oi | |- ( _I |` A ) : A -1-1-onto-> A |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_elsymgbas | |- ( A e. V -> ( ( _I |` A ) e. ( Base ` G ) <-> ( _I |` A ) : A -1-1-onto-> A ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( A e. V -> ( _I |` A ) e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
